name: Elementalist Yordle and Demon
author: KenjiHimura
guide:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong area damage;
- Strong survivability;


### 2. CONS

- High cost champions (median cost: 4 coins);
- Strongly mana’s dependent;
- Dependent on two tier 5 champions;
- Need to equip [[item=darkin]] in some champion to obtain Demon's bônus;


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=dragon]]
[[trait=wild]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]
[[item=rapid-firecannon]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game:

[[champion=elise]]
[[champion=lissandra]]
[[champion=tristana]]
[[champion=nidalee]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=poppy]]

[[champion=sejuani]]

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=kennen]]

[[champion=nidalee]]→[[champion=gnar]]

[[champion=lissandra]]→[[champion=brand]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=anivia]]
[[champion=swain]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=anivia]]→[[champion=lissandra]]

[[champion=elise]]→[[champion=shyvana]][[champion=nidalee]][[champion=jayce]]+[[item=darkin]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=darkin]]→[[champion=gnar]][[champion=sejuani]]
[[champion=poppy]][[champion=kennen]]

[[item=frozen-mallet]]→[[champion=gnar]][[champion=kennen]][[champion=swain]][[champion=brand]]
